title: Finance Minister Jeremy Hunt Drops Most of U.K. Tax-Cut Plan
description: Jeremy Hunt, the new finance minister, dropped almost all of Ms. Truss’s planned cuts, a deeply humbling reversal for Ms. Truss.
dc:creator: Mark Landler and Stephen Castle
media:description: The statement by Britain’s chancellor of the Exchequer, Jeremy Hunt, laid bare a government forced into a humiliating 180-degree turn in its economic policy.
